body.name: Kebnor Steamer for Clothes - 15s Fast Heat-up Travel Steamer for Clothes Portable Mini, 800W Powerful Handheld Clothing Garment Steamer, Fabric Wrinkles Remover Steamer for Home Office and Travel 120V
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Travel Steamer】Sturdy and compact handheld steamer, one-button operation, mini and lightweight, 15 seconds fast heating, continuous steaming for 8 minutes, with 800W powerful and long-lasting penetrating steam can effectively and quickly remove wrinkles from clothes. Note: Travel steamer is designed for use with 120V outlets only.

【Visible Water Tank】The travel steamer for clothes is equipped with a 70ml transparent water tank, which allows you to clearly understand the changes in the water volume and fill up the water in time, easy to disassemble and reassemble. Meanwhile, both the travel steamer and water tank adopt the new 360° watertight design, which allows you to remove wrinkles flexibly without worrying about water leakage.

【Strong Cleaning】New material of high-temperature soleplate enhances the ironing effect of the handheld steam ironing. The 226-230°F steam can deep clean your clothes and bring you a thorough cleaning experience, with an ergonomically designed handle for a comfortable grip, and an extra long 6-feet power cord, easy to operate and move the travel steamer while cleaning.

【Travel Mini Steamer】This travel steamer is tailor-made for travel in terms of color, function, shape & weight. The blue color that matches the business tone, lightweight and compact, as light as 1 lb, only the weight of two cell phones. Comes with a storage bag so you can put the portable steamer in your backpack or suitcase when you travel.

【Portable Widely Used】Portable steamer is ideal for ironing all kinds of clothes, an ideal companion for home life and business travel. It is suitable for all fabrics, widely used for t-shirts, shirts, jackets, wool, denim, curtains, furniture, silk, lace, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good clothes steamer. It’s very effective and also convenient/portable due to its size. The steam is hot and strong to do the job ，It immediately remove all wrinkles. And high-temperature steam can not only deeply clean clothes, but also sterilize. I bring this with me when I go on trips and it works every time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient travel steamer
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The travel steamer exceeded my expectations. Its compact design makes it perfect for on-the-go use, fitting effortlessly into my luggage. Despite its size, it packs a powerful punch, quickly removing wrinkles and freshening up my clothes. The easy-to-fill water reservoir and swift heating are a game-changer. This steamer is a reliable companion for any traveler who wants to maintain a polished look effortlessly. Highly recommended for its efficiency and convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The portable steamer for clothes exceeded my expectations. Its compact design makes it easy to carry, and it heats up quickly. The steam output effectively removes wrinkles, leaving my clothes looking fresh and well-pressed. A convenient and reliable tool for on-the-go garment care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for Wrinkle-Free Clothes on the Go
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Kebnor Steamer for Clothes, and it has been an absolute game-changer for my travel and home needs. Its fast heat-up time is very efficient, allowing me to quickly remove wrinkles from my clothing. It's lightweight, easy to handle, and the water tank capacity is perfect for several garments.The decent power is impressive for such a compact and portable device, making it ideal for both home and travel use. I also love its effectiveness on various fabrics without causing any damage. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel
reviews.reviewText: It's awesome for travel because it's small and stylish, just like I hoped. It heats up quickly and does a good job on both light clothes and heavy curtains. No leaks, and it's perfect for everyday use. The small water container needs frequent refills because it's tiny, but that's okay. It's very effective and easy to carry because of its size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Wrinkle Remover
reviews.reviewText: The Clothes Steamer is an absolute lifesaver for anyone seeking a convenient and efficient solution to wrinkles. Its portable design makes it suitable for use anywhere, and the quick heating, along with powerful steam, effortlessly removes wrinkles from all types of clothing. A must-have for those who appreciate a polished look without the hassle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, quick steaming for clothing, but hard to dry reservoir
reviews.reviewText: This handheld steamer works as described, and is good for steaming a few items at a time. It heated up super quick, and was ready to use within a minute or so. I steamed a few pieces of clothing with this, and it worked well at removing wrinkles, but the shape and way the steam comes out made me need to put it really right next to the fabric for it to work. I think one shirt that had sewed in pleats got damaged/the threading to hold the pleats melted or got too loose from the steam, unfortunately. It comes with a nice storage bag and a cord wrap for organization. A downside is that it's really hard to get all the water out of the water reservoir when you're done, based on the shape of that piece, so I put it away with that piece detached (in the bag provided), but it was still wet when I pulled it out a week later. This is unfortunate, as I don't want it to get gross or moldy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Just grabbed this Travel Steamer, it's a total game-changer! Compact, but don't let the size fool you - this little guy packs a punch. Hit that one button, and in 15 seconds flat, it's spewing out powerful steam, blasting wrinkles into oblivion for a solid 8 minutes straight. And it hits 226-230°F, so not only does it iron your clothes, but it deep cleans too.Handles like a dream with that comfy grip, and the 6-foot cord gives you all the reach you need. Now, here's the kicker – it's made for the road warriors. Weighs as much as two cell phones, rocking that professional blue tone, and slips into your bag with its own little storage bag.I've ironed everything from tees to curtains; this thing is a fabric magician. Home, away, doesn't matter – this Travel Steamer is now my ride-or-die for fighting off wrinkles. Seriously, you need this in your life!
